Mercury::NubException

Mercury::NubException Class Reference
[Mercury]

This is the base class for all exception types that are thrown by various Mercury classes. More...

Detailed Description

This is the base class for all exception types that are thrown by various Mercury classes.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

This is the default constructor for a NubException.

Member Function Documentation

bool Mercury::NubException::getAddress ( Address &  addr  )  const [inline]

This method returns the address for which this exception occurred.

There is no address associated with the base class of this exception, and this method is intended to be overridden.

Reason Mercury::NubException::reason (  )  const [inline]

This method returns the reason for the exception.
